document.full_text: syrian forces spread through southern towns thursday and tightened their grip on two other cities, broadening a crackdown ahead of what could prove a pivotal day for protests against president bashar al-assad.
document.title: assad broadens syria crackdown, tanks push south
lines_and_colors: syrian forces spread through southern towns thursday and tightened their grip on two other cities, broadening a crackdown ahead of what could prove a pivotal day for protests against president bashar al-assad.
